name: Knife Club VR
description:
Knife Club VR throws you in the middle of an all out knife fight brawl. Duck, dodge, throw, and destroy. This isn't simple AI you're up against. This is real player on player combat. Take cover behind what ever you can. But that cover can only last so long with a barrage of weapons flying at you. Uses realistic physics to mimic throwing knives at people. Fight strangers, or your friends, in our underground club. Built from the ground up for VR.


  • Play online against other VR players
  • Destructible environments
  • Multiplayer duels (1v1 Combat)
  • Multiplayer team games (2v2 Combat)
  • Fight in different levels: The Trench, The Basement, and The Prison
  • Hone you skills in the lobby with practice targets
  • Supports with both the HTC Vive and the Oculus Rift with Touch.




We'll see you in the club! 🔪
